required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on October 07, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Place of ECMO in the Management of Severe Refractory ARDS Associated With Covid-19
clinical_study.official_title: STUDY ECMO-COVID-19 : Place of ECMO in the Management of Severe Refractory ARDS Associated With Covid-19

brief_summary.textblock: Describe COVID-19 patients who are receiving ECMO-VV respiratory replacement and what happens to them.

primary_outcome.measure: Retrospective description of COVID-19 patients receiving respiratory ECMO-VV supplementation and what happens to them
primary_outcome.time_frame: Files analysed retrospectily from March 1st, 2020 to April 15, 2020 will be examined

study_pop.textblock: Adult patients with a COVID-19 diagnosis by RT-PCR
